original_title: Film for Invisible Ink, Case No. 142: Abbreviation for Dead Winter [Diminished by 1,794]
overview: “A single piece of paper, a second stab at suture, a story three times over, a frame for every mile. With words by Charles Darwin. A long-distance dedication for a far-away friend halfway up the mountain.” —David Gatten
title: Film for Invisible Ink, Case No. 142: Abbreviation for Dead Winter [Diminished by 1,794]
